Seven guides you towards your fitness goal, and now it’s even better!

Every update includes improvements for speed and reliability. As new features become available, we’ll highlight those for you in the app.

全新锻炼部分！更容易查找、学习及开始你的完美锻炼。

新锻炼部分
从Seven任何位置快速开始、探索和启动锻炼。为iPhone、iPad和Apple Watch重新设计。

54(!)新锻炼
我们将Seven的锻炼量翻倍。新筛选器可轻松找到你要查找的锻炼。

今日锻炼
每天都提供一个仅供当天试用的免费锻炼。

自由式练习
让Seven根据你的喜好为你创建一个锻炼。如果喜欢，可以保存下来坚持做。

收藏
标记最喜欢的锻

A whole new workout section! It's all about making it easier to find, learn, and start your perfect workout.

New Workout Section
Quick-start, explore and launch workouts from anywhere in Seven. Redesigned for iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch.

Fitness Buddy

Fresh Colors

Seven引导你实现你的健身目标！

更新后功能更强大，包括速度和可靠性改进。新功能会在应用中突出显示。

如果在使用过程中遇到问题，或只是想问声好，可发邮件至support@perigee.se。

We believe in the power of a little friendly competition. If you do too, you’ll love our latest update. Introducing 1v1 Challenges!

The rules are simple: go head to head with a friend for 7 days. Whoever completes more workouts, wins! Bonus points,

Earn Exercises
As a free user you get a new exercise for every friend you invite to Seven.

30 Day Guest Pass
7 Club members can now gift 5 lucky friends 1 month of unlimited access.

Reply to Comments
Start more personal conversation
